text: Conveniently located at neighborhood heartland of Lentor and Yio Chu Kang with scenic views of Seletar Simpang Kiri River leading towards Seletar Reservoir breezy greenery  away from busy cityscapes,  this bus depot occupied by SBS Transit as anchor operator and SMRT buses as tenant. It is a main bus depot with offices and maintenance facilities servicing most of the buses in Singapore. It relieved the pressure off Ang Mo Kio Bus Depot.  Noted for environmental friendly, the green roof reduces energy consumption. The bus washing system recycles 80% of the water used. Amenities include free wifi modern gym and handphone  charging stations. Bus stop with buses serving Yishun to Yishun MRT bus interchange Yishun Town Gardens Yishun Town Square Northpoint City with plenty of dinning shopping banking supermarkets library cinemas entertainments groceries sundries postage services community centre and amenities nearby. Direct bus 853 to Kallang and Geylang. Clean tidy orderly relaxing friendly fast attentive cosy comfy welcoming ambience.
The 2nd level has a big air conditioner canteen with a gym.

A bit secluded. Hear say there’s air con and that it is ok. Not sure if I would recommend coming here since it’s quite a distance from the nearest bus stop and facilities.

It is big, spacious and clean. The latest bus depot for a while.
Do not try to trespass! Unless you are a staff member or bus captain!
Nice and clean working environment... Canteen here is good and cheap...
It's a maintenance of SBS and SMRT buses
